text:
Tomcat 3.1 assumed the installation dir to be <drive>:\jakarta-tomcat. Accordingly, all .bat files had this hard coded. The default unzip dir was also this. With 3.2, it has changed to jakarta-tomcat-3.2 but the .bat files still use the jakarta-tomcat path.

Not really a bug but a show stopper definetly.
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org

text: Absolute path names are no longer used in any of the .bat files.
creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
